message: Let's be fair and end this quickly!
I understand you want to be fair, so let's switch it up this round. We can settle this now and avoid further losses.
Meet me in the middle, we're both losing out on value here.
Okay, I see your point. Let's meet in the middle, but with my previous offer. This minimizes our losses.
Exactly in the middle, no more games. Inflation is killing us.
